title: The Roar of the Huntids: A Novel about the Empowerment of an Empath
description:
This novel about an empath is a spiritual thriller... written BY an empath coach and the founder of the system of Empath Empowerment®.It offers entertainment, satire, and insights FOR anyone who was born as an empath.This is the perfect companion Rose Rosetree's four how-to books for empaths:• 
Empath Empowerment in 30 Days
• 
The Empowered Empath—Quick & Easy
• 
The Empowered Empath: Owning, Embracing, and Managing Your Special Gifts
• 
The Master Empath: Turning on Your Empath Gifts at Will—in Love, Business and Friendship (Includes Training in Skilled Empath Merge)
author: Rose  Rosetree
